name: Kewum
description: Kewum is a traditional Sri Lankan sweet made from jaggery, coconut, and rice flour, known for its chewy texture and rich, sweet flavor.
author: admin

name: Kokkis
description: Kokis is a traditional Sri Lankan sweet made from rice flour, sugar, coconut milk, and cardamom, deep-fried to a crispy, golden texture.

name: Faluda
description: Faluda is a popular dessert drink made with rose syrup, vermicelli, basil seeds, milk, and ice cream, often served as a refreshing treat in South Asia.

name: Kola Kenda
description: Kola Kenda is a traditional Sri Lankan herbal porridge made with a mix of leafy greens, rice, and coconut milk, known for its nutritious and healing properties.

name: Kanji
description: Kanji is a traditional Sri Lankan rice porridge, often made with rice, spices, and sometimes vegetables or meat, known for its soothing and comforting qualities, especially during illness or as a breakfast dish.

name: Patties
description: Patties are a popular snack in Sri Lanka, consisting of a flaky pastry shell filled with spiced meat (such as chicken, beef, or fish) or vegetables, and then deep-fried to a golden, crispy texture.

name: Rolls
description: Rolls are a popular Sri Lankan snack made by wrapping spiced meat, vegetables, or fish in a soft, thin flatbread, then deep-frying or baking them to create a crispy, savory treat.

name: Ulundu Vadai
description: Ulundu Vadai is a savory Sri Lankan snack made from ground urad dal (black lentils), seasoned with spices and herbs, then deep-fried into crispy, doughnut-shaped fritters.

name: Kotthu
description: Kotthu is a popular Sri Lankan street food made by stir-frying chopped roti (flatbread) with vegetables, meat (chicken, beef, or mutton), eggs, and a blend of spices, creating a flavorful and hearty dish.

name: Fried Rice
description: Fried rice is a popular dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with vegetables, meat (chicken, beef, or seafood), eggs, and a variety of seasonings, often including soy sauce, to create a flavorful, quick meal.
